Articles.Content:
Hello, I making a rocket that sends 8 individual capsules to space. I have decided to launch them all at once but once at a high enough altetude I will disconnect them from each other, I realised that I cannot activate the others parachutes without switching between them :/. I was hoping someone could help me automate the parachute deployment or even staging?

Staging may be better as I can then do more things with it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thankyou, sincerly Bowan
Welcome aboard! [Smart Parts](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64227) can do what you're looking for.

You can also try setting the pressure on the parachutes so that they will open at the height you want and then deploy them all before separating the ship. It's a little trickier to do now that the chutes are more fragile but the increased physics range inside the atmosphere allows more dispersion of parts without them auto deleting.

Thankyou, this has helped me out alot! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).

and btw Red Iron Crown, unfortunetly I can not use mods as I am in demo atm.

Try [Burn together mod.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75170-WIP-Plugin-%280-90%29-Burn-Together!-Alpha-v7-0-%283-29-15%29) 

It allows you to control multiple rockets at a time.
